TextView.android:text:
1. There are two places from where you can navigate through app in different activities one is home page and other is Navigation Drawer.

 2. List Items Shows all the data that is stored in the database by clicking delete button you can delete data from there.

 3. In the add section user can store data in the database and it will be retrieved into list items.

 4. Live data represent all the data coming from http server Api this is a free api and offer limited requests.

 5. in the about section all the details of the developer will be shown which is stored in Shared Preferences you can edit it.
